# How to use battery

## create your app

```ts
import { Battery } from '@site/ui/Battery'
import { useBattery } from 'reev/react'
//                 or from '@reev/external/react'

export const App = () => {
        const { level, charging } = useBattery()
        return <Battery level={level} charging={charging} />
}
```

import { Battery } from '@site/ui/Battery'
import { useBattery } from 'reev/react'
//                 or from '@reev/external/react'

export const App = () => {
        const { level, charging } = useBattery()
        return <Battery level={level} charging={charging} />
}

<App />
